comments.text: Observed in console output. Current services-central (~= m-c nightly).
comments.author: bugzilla@twinql.com
comments.raw_text: Observed in console output. Current services-central (~= m-c nightly).
comments.creator: bugzilla@twinql.com

comments.raw_text:
I've just had the same warning on code I was writing, where it was very obvious that the view wasn't null/undefined. I pointed a debugger at the process and from the stack it was obvious that some C++ code was attempting to QueryInterface the view object. Adding
  QueryInterface: XPCOMUtils.generateQI([Ci.nsITreeView])
in my treeview implementation silenced the warning.
comments.author: florian@mozilla.com
